post:
IO Zoom is a registered company based in Houston, Texas. We have multiple datacenter locations to choose from in Los Angeles, Chicago, Dallas, and Miami.

Not all VPS hosting providers are the same. Here is why IO Zoom is better.

Lightning Fast Servers
Our servers were built for performance and run the latest Intel CPU's, 100% SSD drives in RAID 10.

DDoS Protection
We include up to 10 Gbps DDoS protection that prevents over 95% of the most common DDoS attacks keeping your VPS online.

100% Uptime Guarantee
We stand by our hardware and network that if it isn't reachable for even a minute we'll issue credit to your account according to our service level agreement.


Included Features
» Linux or Windows VPS
» KVM (Linux) /Hyper-V (Windows) Virtualization
» 30 Days Money Back Guarantee
» 100% White Labeled Servers
» Full Root/Administrator Access
» Free Daily Backups
» Free Dedicated IP
» Free Server Management (cPanel or Plesk Required)

Now Available!
Asia Optimized IP in our Los Angeles datacenter.
Due to demand for fast speeds to and from China, Taiwan and other Asian countries, our Los Angeles Asia-Optimized IP is route optimized for Asia based customers and their visitors.


FAQ
Q: Are these VPS plans self managed or managed?
A: Our plans are self managed but if you add cPanel or Plesk we will manage it for you at no charge.

Q: How long will it take to setup my VPS?
A: Please allow up to 24 hours to setup your VPS. If you order during sales hours it will be setup within a few hours. All orders are manually verified and checked for fraud before setup.

Q: Do you have a test download file or test ip?
A: You can find our test download file and ip on our datacenter page.
